metadata.title: CVE-2022-26280 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Libarchive v3.6.0 was discovered to contain an out-of-bounds read via thecomponent zipx_lzma_alone_init.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libarchive-tools - 3.6.0-1ubuntu1
libarchive13 - 3.6.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6.0-1ubuntu1').
